channel.title: InYourBones Daily Music News
channel.description: Top 5 daily music stories handpicked by InYourBones

item.title: Florence + The Machine Cover Lady Gaga’s “Abracadabra”: Watch
item.description: 🎶 Florence + The Machine puts a spell on us with their enchanting cover of Lady Gaga's "Abracadabra"! ✨ Watch now! 🌟 #MusicMagic

item.title: Lily Allen Announces West End Girl UK Tour
item.description: 🎤 Lily Allen is hitting the road! 🚌 Get ready to dance and sing along on her West End Girl UK Tour! 🇬🇧 #LilyAllenTour

item.title: Alice Cooper and Criss Angel Teaming Up for “Welcome to Our Nightmare” Las Vegas Show
item.description: 🎸 Get ready to rock your world in Vegas with @alicecooper and @CrissAngel's mind-blowing collaboration! 🔮 #WelcomeToOurNightmare #RockAndMagic

item.title: Oasis Box Up ‘Morning Glory’ Singles, ‘Wonderwall’ Turns 30
item.description: 🎉 Celebrating 30 years of the iconic 'Wonderwall'! Oasis fans, this box set is a dream come true! 🎸 #Oasis #Wonderwall30

item.title: Brandi Carlile Returns to Herself
item.description: Guess who's back and better than ever? 🌟 Brandi Carlile is returning to her roots with new music! 🎶 #BrandiCarlile #NewMusicAlert
